meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pierre LeBoeuf Barbara Linn Neil Landau Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #894.

td.p: Pierre LeBoeuf, an aerospace engineer originally from Tupper Lake, New York
Barbara Linn, a homemaker from Evanston, Illinois
Neil Landau, an engineer from El Cerrito, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,100)

tr.td: ROMANTIC LYRICS
KISSING
SICKNESS & HEALTH
ANIMALS
THE MOVIES
GEOGRAPHIC ANAGRAMS
